sentences: annuleer alle timers in deze ruimte

errors.handle_error: Sorry, er is onverwacht iets misgegaan
errors.no_area: Sorry, ik kan {{ area }} niet vinden
errors.no_domain:
{% set translations = {
  "button": "knop",
  "camera": "camera",
  "input_button": "knop",
  "alarm_control_panel": "alarm",
  "automation": "automatisering",
  "fan": "ventilator",
  "climate": "thermostaat",
  "humidifier": "ontvochtiger",
  "input_boolean": "schakelaar",
  "siren": "sirence",
  "water_heater": "boiler",
  "light": "lamp",
  "switch": "schakelaar",
  "script": "script",
  "remote": "afstandsbediening",
  "lock": "slot",
  "vacuum": "stofzuiger",
  "scene": "scne",
  "media_player": "mediaspeler",
  "lawn_mower": "grasmaaier",
  "valve": "klep"
  } %}
{% if domain in translations -%}
  Sorry, ik kan geen enkele {{ translations[domain] }} vinden
{%- else -%}
  Sorry, ik kan geen apparaat van dat type vinden.
{%- endif %}

{% set translations = {

HassClimateSetTemperature.default: Temperatuur ingesteld op {{ slots.temperature }} {{ 'graad' if (slots.temperature | float) == 1 else 'graden' }}

HassStartTimer.default: {% set h = slots.hours if slots.hours is defined else none %} {% set m = slots.minutes if slots.minutes is defined else none %} {% set s = slots.seconds if slots.seconds is defined else none %} {% set h_text = h ~ ' uur' if h else '' %} {% set m_text = (30 if m in ['half', 'halve', '1/2', '1/2e'] else 90 if m in ['anderhalf', 'anderhalve'] else m) ~ (' minuut' if m in [ '1', 'een', 'n'] else ' minuten') if m else '' %} {% set s_text = (30 if s in ['half', 'halve', '1/2', '1/2e'] else 90 if s in ['anderhalf', 'anderhalve'] else s) ~ (' seconde' if s in [ '1', 'een', 'n'] else ' seconden') if s else '' %} {% set text_list = [ h_text, m_text, s_text] | select() | list %} {% set text = text_list[:-1] | join(', ') ~ ' en ' ~ text_list[-1] if text_list | count > 2 else text_list | join(' en ') %} {% set name = (' met de naam ' ~ slots.name | trim) if slots.name is defined else '' %} Timer gezet voor {{ text }}{{ name }}
HassStartTimer.command: {% set h = slots.hours if slots.hours is defined else none %} {% set m = slots.minutes if slots.minutes is defined else none %} {% set s = slots.seconds if slots.seconds is defined else none %} {% set h_text = h ~ ' uur' if h else '' %} {% set m_text = (30 if m in ['half', 'halve', '1/2', '1/2e'] else 90 if m in ['anderhalf', 'anderhalve'] else m) ~ (' minuut' if m in [ '1', 'een', 'n'] else ' minuten') if m else '' %} {% set s_text = (30 if s in ['half', 'halve', '1/2', '1/2e'] else 90 if s in ['anderhalf', 'anderhalve'] else s) ~ (' seconde' if s in [ '1', 'een', 'n'] else ' seconden') if s else '' %} {% set text_list = [ h_text, m_text, s_text] | select() | list %} {% set text = text_list[:-1] | join(', ') ~ ' en ' ~ text_list[-1] if text_list | count > 2 else text_list | join(' en ') %} Opdracht wordt uitgevoerd over {{ text }}

HassGetCurrentTime.default: {% set minute_str = '{0:02d}'.format(slots.time.minute) %} Het is {{ slots.time.hour }}:{{ minute_str }}

HassGetCurrentDate.default:
{% set months = {
   1: 'januari',
   2: 'februari',
   3: 'maart',
   4: 'april',
   5: 'mei',
   6: 'juni',
   7: 'juli',
   8: 'augustus',
   9: 'september',
   10: 'oktober',
   11: 'november',
   12: 'december',
} %} {% set weekday = [
  'maandag',
  'dinsdag',
  'woensdag',
  'donderdag',
  'vrijdag',
  'zaterdag',
  'zondag'
] %} Het is {{ weekday[slots.date.weekday()] }} {{ slots.date.day }} {{ months[slots.date.month] }} {{ slots.date.year }}

HassGetWeather.default:
{% set weather_condition = {
  'clear': 'en helder',
  'clear-night': 'en helder',
  'cloudy': 'en bewolkt',
  'exceptional': 'en extreem',
  'fog': 'met mist',
  'hail': 'met hagel',
  'lightning': 'met onweer',
  'lightning-rainy': 'met onweer en regen',
  'partlycloudy': 'en gedeeltelijk bewolkt',
  'pouring': 'met stortregen',
  'rainy': 'met regen',
  'snowy': 'met sneeuw',
  'snowy-rainy': 'met sneeuw en regen',
  'sunny': 'en zonnig',
  'windy': 'met wind',
  'windy-variant': 'met wind en bewolking'
} %} {{ state.attributes.get('temperature') }} graden {{ weather_condition.get((state.state | string).lower(), "") }}

HassCancelAllTimers.default: {% if slots.canceled < 1: %} Geen timer geannuleerd. {% elif slots.canceled == 1: %} 1 timer geannuleerd. {% else: %} {{ slots.canceled }} timers geannuleerd. {% endif %}

HassDecreaseTimer.default: {% set h = slots.hours if slots.hours is defined else none %} {% set m = slots.minutes if slots.minutes is defined else none %} {% set s = slots.seconds if slots.seconds is defined else none %} {% set h_text = h ~ ' uur' if h else '' %} {% set m_text = (30 if m in ['half', 'halve', '1/2', '1/2e'] else 90 if m in ['anderhalf', 'anderhalve'] else m) ~ (' minuut' if m in [ '1', 'een', 'n'] else ' minuten') if m else '' %} {% set s_text = (30 if s in ['half', 'halve', '1/2', '1/2e'] else 90 if s in ['anderhalf', 'anderhalve'] else s) ~ (' seconde' if s in [ '1', 'een', 'n'] else ' seconden') if s else '' %} {% set text_list = [ h_text, m_text, s_text] | select() | list %} {% set text = text_list[:-1] | join(', ') ~ ' en ' ~ text_list[-1] if text_list | count > 2 else text_list | join(' en ') %} {% set name = (' met de naam ' ~ slots.name | trim) if slots.name is defined else '' %} Timer{{ name }} ingekort met {{ text }}

HassIncreaseTimer.default: {% set h = slots.hours if slots.hours is defined else none %} {% set m = slots.minutes if slots.minutes is defined else none %} {% set s = slots.seconds if slots.seconds is defined else none %} {% set h_text = h ~ ' uur' if h else '' %} {% set m_text = (30 if m in ['half', 'halve', '1/2', '1/2e'] else 90 if m in ['anderhalf', 'anderhalve'] else m) ~ (' minuut' if m in [ '1', 'een', 'n'] else ' minuten') if m else '' %} {% set s_text = (30 if s in ['half', 'halve', '1/2', '1/2e'] else 90 if s in ['anderhalf', 'anderhalve'] else s) ~ (' seconde' if s in [ '1', 'een', 'n'] else ' seconden') if s else '' %} {% set text_list = [ h_text, m_text, s_text] | select() | list %} {% set text = text_list[:-1] | join(', ') ~ ' en ' ~ text_list[-1] if text_list | count > 2 else text_list | join(' en ') %} {% set name = (' met de naam ' ~ slots.name | trim) if slots.name is defined else '' %} Timer{{ name }} verlengd met {{ text }}

HassRespond.listening: Nee, ik neem alleen op na het wake-word.
HassRespond.data: Je data gaat naar je Home Assistant server.
HassRespond.commands: Voor meer informatie over wat ik kan, ga naar home streepje assistant punt I O slash voice.
HassRespond.creator: Ik ben gemaakt door de geweldige Home Assistant community, die bestaat uit mensen vanuit de hele wereld.

expansion_rules.name: [de|het] {name}
expansion_rules.timer_duration_hours:
(
  {timer_hours:hours} (uur[tje]|uren|uurtjes) [[en] {timer_minutes:minutes} (minuut[je[s]]|minuten)] [[en] {timer_seconds:seconds} seconde[s|n]]
 |{timer_hours:hours} (uur[tje]|uren|uurtjes) en een {timer_half:seconds} minuut[je]
 |{timer_hours:hours} [en] [een] {timer_half:minutes} uur[tje]
 |{timer_half:minutes} uur[tje]
 |{timer_one_and_a_half:minutes} uur[tje]
)
